events.name: lithium-ion recycling
events.wd_description: Three main methods are used in lithium-ion recycling.
events.description: Three main methods are used in lithium-ion recycling.

events.name: pyrometallurgical
events.wd_description: The battery is melted in a hot furnace to recover some of the cathode metal.
events.description: The battery is melted in a hot furnace to recover some of the cathode metal.

events.name: hydrometallurgical
events.wd_description: Hydrometallurgy is a metal recovery method involving aqueous solutions to perform leaching processes.
events.description: Hydrometallurgy is a metal recovery method involving aqueous solutions to perform leaching processes.

events.name: bioleaching
events.wd_description: The bioleaching technique uses bacteria to retrieve precious metals, but it is challenging because the bacteria need a substantial amount of time to grow.
events.description: The bioleaching technique uses bacteria to retrieve precious metals, but it is challenging because the bacteria need a substantial amount of time to grow.

events.name: Durability challenges
events.wd_description: Durability issues arise from the high energy content and the complexity of balancing various energies in LIBs.
events.description: Durability issues arise from the high energy content and the complexity of balancing various energies in LIBs.

events.name: Energy balance
events.wd_description: Balancing chemical, thermal, mechanical, and electrical energies in LIBs is crucial for durability.
events.description: Balancing chemical, thermal, mechanical, and electrical energies in LIBs is crucial for durability.

events.name: Force-phase fields
events.wd_description: The coupling of force-phase fields from various energies poses challenges in achieving durability.
events.description: The coupling of force-phase fields from various energies poses challenges in achieving durability.
